no-permission: ❌No tienes permisos para usar este comando, necesitas permisos de **ADMINISTRADOR**.
need-logs: ❌Necesitas logs para este comando, activalos con el siguiente comando `$setlogchannel [channel-id]`

bans.joinedblacklisted: Usuario se unio y esta en la blacklist

alt.newacckick: Esta cuenta solamente es **{days} dia(s)** de edad. El usuario fue kickeado.
alt.newacclog: Usuario con una nueva cuenta creada en {created} y este server requiere un minimo de {mindays} dia(s) de tiempo de haberse creado la cuenta.
alt.newacc: Esta cuenta es solo {days} dia(s) de edad.
alt.alreadyenabled: ❌Ya tienes proteccion de cuentas secundarias, actualmente el minimo es **{days}** dia(s).
alt.disabled: ✅ Se ha desactivado la proteccion de cuentas secundarias exitosamente.
alt.enabled: ✅ Se ha activado la **Proteccion de cuentas secundarias** de cuentas creadas hace **{args}** daia(s)
alt.minimum-age: ❌Please type in the minimum account age accepted in your server.
alt.no-args: ❌ Por favor escriba verdadero o falso despues del comando.

checking.nouser: ❌ No se ha encontrado a ese usuario . Porfavor ingrese un @ valido o revise la ID del usuario.

blacklist.notblacklisted: EL USUARIO NO ESTA EN BLACKLISTED

report.thanks: ✅ Gracias por enviar el reporte! ID de reporte: {uuid}
report.no-proof: ❌ Porfavor envie pruebas. (URL con imagen, ej: gyazo)
report.no-reason: ❌Porfavor envie pruebas y la razon del reporte.

fetch.role-above: This person is a admin / have a role above me
fetch.no-permission: I DON'T HAVE PERMISSION TO BAN PEOPLE

help.blacklist: Adds a user to the blacklist list **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.unblacklist: Removes a user from the blacklist **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.checkuser: Checks if a user is blacklisted
help.fetch: Fetches your discord and checking if you have any blacklisted people inthere **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.report: Sends a report to the bot admins
help.viewreport: Send the report with that id. **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.viewreports: Displays all pending reports. **[BOT ADMINS ONLY]**
help.setlogchannel: Sets the log channel for your server, the bot will log here when someone is getting banned.
help.setautoban: Automatically bans blacklisted users from your server. *Note: Enabled by default*
help.setaltprotection: Sets the minimum account age in days for your server, if it's set to true it will kick anyone that tries to join with an account age lower than you set.
help.setautoverify: Do you want new members to verify themselves and see if they're in leaking discords? If the kick argument is enabled then users that does not complete (ignore) the verification will get kicked.
help.userinfo: Shows info about the mentioned users discord account.
help.setlanguage: Sets the bot language for your guild.
help.languages: Shows a list with all the current supported languages

logs.updated: ✅Sucessfully updated log channel, logs will now be displayed in <#{channel}>
logs.added: ✅Successfully set log channel, logs will now be displayed in <#{channel}>
logs.same-channel: ❌Logs are already being sent out in <#{logchannel}>
logs.not-correctly: ❌You did not provide the channel correctly. Make sure to send the id of the channel. ex: **$setlogchannel 702876668422782988**
logs.no-logs: ❌You don't have logs enabled in this guild.

verification.inleaking: ⚠️ <@{args}> Successfully verified and **is in the following leaking servers**
verification.noleaking: ✅ <@{args}> Successfully verified and is not in any leaking servers.
verification.forceverify: {author} from {guild.name} wants you to verify yourself. Do it with this link http://stoptheresellers.xyz/auth/verify
verification.autoverify: Welcome to {guild.name}. In order to stay in the server you need to verify yourself with this link http://stoptheresellers.xyz/auth/verify.
verification.kick-msg: User did not verify the force verification made by {author}
verification.no-kick-permission: ❌User did not verify and i **can't** kick because of no kick permission.

autoban.alreadyenabled: ❌Auto bans are already enabled in this server.
autoban.enabled: ✅Auto bans are now **enabled** in this guild.
autoban.alreadydisabled: ❌Auto bans are already disabled in this server.
autoban.disabled: ✅Auto bans are now **disabled** in this guild.

userinfo.no-user: ❌Did not find a user with that id. Are you sure that the user is in this server?
userinfo.no-user2: ❌Could not find a user with that id.

autoverify.alreadyenabled: ❌Auto verification are already enabled in this server.
autoverify.enabled: ✅Auto verification is now **enabled** in this guild.
autoverify.alreadydisabled: ❌Auto verification is already disabled in this server.
autoverify.disabled: ✅Auto verification is now **disabled** in this guild.
autoverify.no-args: ❌Please type `true` or `false` if you want autokick enabled. (Autokick will kick users not verifying)

crosscheck.success: ✅Loading... I will dm you with a list of blacklisted users in your server in 10 seconds.
crosscheck.error: ❌Something went wrong, could not send the list.
crosscheck.no-dm: ❌I can't dm you, do you have your dms set to friends only?
crosscheck.cooldown: ❌You can only use this command once per 24 hours.

languages.error: ❌Por favor de los lenguajes disponibles, use $languages to see all the supported ones.
languages.success: ✅Se ha cambiado el lenguaje del servidor **{args}**
languages.contribute: Quieres contribuir y agregar mas lenguajes? Hazlo aqui!
